full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
================================

**Reference Number:** WS3989869863-Doc4310787417

**AMENDMENT 2**

**Solicitation Number:** WS3989869863

**Publication Date:** January 26, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** March 1, 2024, 14:00:00 EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites you to participate in a Solicitation of Offers for a three-year Standing Offer for Window Cleaning Services. This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number W6889-230152 dated June 16, 2023, with a closing date of July 28, 2024.

**Notice Details**
----------------

* Solicitation Number: WS3989869863
* Publication Date: January 26, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: March 1, 2024, 14:00:00 EST
* Amendment Date: February 15, 2024

**Solicitation Description**
---------------------------

A three-year Standing Offer is required to supply all necessary supervision, labour, materials, tools, transportation, and equipment for Window Cleaning Services to Real Property Operations at Garrison Petawawa. Bidders must clearly demonstrate compliance with each Mandatory Technical Criterion. Failure to demonstrate compliance will result in the offer being deemed non-responsive and given no further consideration.

**Mandatory Site Visit**
------------------------

A Mandatory Site Visit will be held at CFB Petawawa, Petawawa, ON, K8H 2X3 on February 14, 2024, beginning at 10:00 am EST. ONLY BIDDERS THAT REGISTER AND ATTEND THE MANDATORY SITE VISIT WILL BE ALLOWED TO BID. A secure clearance will require a reliable security clearance mechanism.

**Contract Categories**
-----------------------

Procurement Category: Servicing (SRV)
Trade Agreements: Various Free Trade Agreements (Please refer to the Notice URL)

**Roger Partners categories Jacques swing host r**
-----------------------------------------------

Regions of Opportunity: None
Regions of Delivery: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
million Mein Advisors growth Saving Visit Quiet Pricing tourism

**Supply and Service**
----------------------

The following Services and Supplies are required:

* Window Cleaning Services
* Materials, tools, transportation, and equipment necessary to perform Window Cleaning Services

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For further information, please refer to the Contact
